scripts.build: RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=-simd128" wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg && bun run ../../scripts/inline-wasm-compute.ts --pkg-dir pkg && RUSTFLAGS="-C target-feature=+simd128" wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir pkg-simd && bun run ../../scripts/inline-wasm-compute.ts --pkg-dir pkg-simd
